title: utf16 needs clarification on endianness & possibly another function
body:
The utf16.Decode() function assumes a particular endianness: the docs should say which
one it assumes.

Or better still, why not provide utf16.DecodeBE() and utf16.DecodeLE(), instead?

Also, a function which checks the byte order mark so you know which endianness the
UTF-16 uses would be nice.
